articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, appreciated a concert "The Women Are Flowers" given by the Unhasu Orchestra at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday on the occasion of the International Women's Day.
					 He warmly congratulated the audience on the day and extended warm greetings to all the Korean women.
					
					 The concert began with the national anthem. Put on the stage were  colorful numbers including female quintet and chorus "Mother of Korea", mixed chorus and pangchang "The Women Are Flowers", mixed duet "My Lover Has Returned", female solo and female pangchang "Our Daughter-in-Law", orchestral music "Swinging Girl", male solo and pangchang "The Tinkle of the Golden Ox Bell on Rungra Islet" and chorus "Single Mind." 
					
					 Some of the audience were invited to the stage when the concert reached its climax.
					
					 In their concert the performers sang high praises of the feats of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who built the socialist power of Juche on this land and the history of the Korean people's struggle and successfully represented the strong will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche without fail, always sharing the destiny with Kim Jong Un who is ushering in a new heyday of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea with his outstanding Songun leadership.
					
					 They also vividly reflected the will of the Korean women and other working people to boost solidarity with the progressive women of the world who are struggling against imperialism and for peace, democracy, national independence, the socialist cause and equality and rights of the women.
					
					 Kim Jong Un acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated the performers on their successful presentation.
					
					 Enjoying the concert were Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak and other senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs, those who had the honor of being received by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, women members of the leadership bodies of the Party Central Committee and women deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly in Pyongyang, officials of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, women scientists of the Ryonha Machine Management Bureau and the State Academy of Sciences including the Biological Engineering Branch, women teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, women officials and innovators of industrial and service establishments and women writers, journalists, anchor persons, creators and artistes in Pyongyang, together with their spouses.
					
					 Also enjoying the concert were Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin and official diplomats of the Chinese and Russian embassies here and their wives.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Azerbaijani Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Azerbaijani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Latif Gandilov, ambassador of Azerbaijan to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 Present there were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and a staff member of Azerbaijani embassy here.
					
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Azerbaijani Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Azerbaijani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Thursday met and had a talk with Latif Gandilov, ambassador of Azerbaijan to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: National Meeting on International Women's Day Held
articles.content:
National Meeting on International Women's Day Held 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to celebrate the 102nd anniversary of the International Women's Day.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Rak Hui, vice-premier of the Cabinet, senior officials of working people's organizations and women officials and labor innovators.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women staying in the socialist homeland, women of embassies of different countries and missions of international organizations in the DPRK and foreign guests.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, made a report.
					
					 She recalled that the women's movement in Juche Korea has covered a road of proud victories and glory under the wise leadership and warm care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 She said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung gave origin to the Korean women's movement of Juche and provided shining traditions in the crucible of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in his early years.
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Kim Il Sung, Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, formed the Anti-Japanese Women's Association, thus providing roots for the building of a genuine women's revolutionary organization.
					
					 After the country's liberation the President formed the Democratic Women's Union of Korea embracing broad masses of women and worked out and promulgated the law on gender equality, the first of its kind in history, offering an occasion of a radical turn in carving out the women's destiny.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, upheld the original idea and policy of Kim Il Sung and performed distinguished feats in the development of the movement for the women's emancipation in Korea.
					
					 Brilliantly recorded in the history of the Korean women's movement shining with victories and glory are the undying revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il who wisely led the Korean women's movement under the banner of Songun.
					
					 He authored works including "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction" and "Let Us Add Shine to the Glorious Tradition of the Women's Movement of Juche Korea in the Great Drive for Building of a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation," thus providing an immortal programme for the Korean women's movement.
					
					 The reporter said that the idea of the Juche-oriented women's movement is being steadfastly carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 She called upon all the women to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and add eternal shine to the glorious revolutionary careers and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons.

articles.title: More Local Rallies of Service Personnel and People Take Place
articles.content:
More Local Rallies of Service Personnel and People Take Place 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people in South Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City met Thursday to vow to wage a merciless sacred war and destroy the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					 The statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches at the rallies.
					
					 The floor was taken by the chief secretaries of the provincial and city committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, officers of the Korean People's Army, members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, youths and students.
					
					 The speakers said that the DPRK's sacred war of retaliation will be escalated till the group of traitors has paid thousand-fold price for all its crimes and make the warmongers at home and abroad trying to fish in troubled waters by patronizing such rabid dogs as Lee repent  of its crime till to its death.
					
					 The human scum will find no breathing spell in this world in face of the sacred war of retaliation to be waged by all its service personnel and people who achieved single-minded unity stronger than nukes under the leadership of the peerlessly great men, they noted. 
					
					 They declared that all of them would perform uninterrupted miracles in the defence of the country and in the difficult and labor-consuming work sites for building a thriving nation in the spirit of wiping out the Lee group of traitors who committed thrice-cursed crimes. 
					
					 Then followed demonstrations of the angry participants.

articles.title: Youths and Students across Country Meet to Vow to Join or Rejoin KPA
articles.content:
Youths and Students across Country Meet to Vow to Join or Rejoin KPA
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Youths and students met in each province from March 6 to 8 to vow to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army.
					 The venues of meetings were packed with youths and students who gathered with the firm determination to rush to the front and mercilessly wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors with arms of Songun and proudly appear in a parade celebrating victory.
					
					 The statement issued by the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out at the meetings to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers branded the recent most hideous provocations as unprecedented acts of treachery which could be committed only by war maniacs and lunatics who go reckless like tiger moths.
					
					 They stressed that such rabid dog as Myung Bak who shakes his fist towards the Heaven will find no breathing spell on this land.
					
					 They vowed to turn out in a sacred war to make a clean sweep of the despicable Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and reduce the centers of the group including Chongwadae into ashes at a single strike.
					
					 They fervently called on all the officials of the youth league and youths and students to volunteer to join or rejoin the KPA to wipe out the Lee group, traitors for all ages and quislings of the worst type, to the last man.
					
					 The participants marched along streets, singing revolutionary songs, "Song of National Defence", "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front" and other songs.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, officials of the youth league, youths and students.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Pledge to Wipe Out Lee Group of Traitors
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Pledge to Wipe Out Lee Group of Traitors 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A-match-for-a hundred soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) are on maximum alert, firmly determined to resolutely destroy the rabid group of traitors who openly challenged the DPRK and declared a war against it by perpetrating the most hideous provocations. 
					 Yang Ho Il, chief of a department of Kim Il Sung Military University, said: 
					
					 All the service personnel of the KPA are now waiting for the earliest possible issue of an order. 
					
					 Let us mercilessly punish those traitors who committed thrice-cursed treason. This is the declaration of the army of Mt. Paektu which never makes an empty talk. 
					
					 There is a limit to the patience of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK. 
					
					 We can never pardon such human scum, group of traitors, who dared to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK after rubbing salt into the wounds of the fellow countrymen mourning over the loss of the great leader of the nation.
					
					 The KPA having a mission to mete out a severe punishment to the group of traitors will resolutely wipe out rat Myung Bak, the worst traitor and maniac hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen, and his servants and reduce the den of the crimes into ashes. 
					
					 U Yun Chol, department director of Kang Gon Military Academy, branded Lee Myung Bak groomed by outsiders as a rabid dog. 
					
					 He said:
					
					 Lee, once a businessman engrossed in money making, got insane after taking a "presidential" seat overnight. 
					
					 South Korean people have called Lee Myung Bak "rat-Bak" as he has served outsiders at the cost of the blood shed by the people and grown corpulent while bringing big profits to the rich. 
					
					 "Anti-rat expedition" was organized in south Korea and shouts of the slogan "Let us all start to kill the rat in Chongwadae" are heard from across south Korea. 
					
					 At present south Koreans feel so regretful for failing to kill the rat-Bak in good time. 
					
					 Not content with having turned the land of the south into tundra, Lee is now making last-ditch efforts, showing his dirty teeth. 
					
					 The strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu will surely settle the grudge of the south Korean people who failed to kill the insane guy in good time.
					
					 Choe Song Nam, officer of the KPA, said it is the demand of the times to bury traitor Lee, scum of history worse than a rabid dog and the worst idiot. 
					
					 It is widely known that Lee Myung Bak got the nickname of "2MB." This means his thinking power is no more than 2 mega bites. 
					
					 Such underwit dared to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. We can never allow him to escape. 
					
					 The best way for dealing with such rabid dog is to beat it to death with a big stick. 
					
					 Now is the time to kill traitor Lee and his servants at the point of bayonet as they are making desperate efforts to prolong their remaining days. 
					
					 The KPA, which has cultivated matchless grit and courage under the care of the brilliant commanders of Songun, will throw the wicked group of traitors into the dumping ground of history and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification with invincible arms.

articles.title: It Is Time to Take Revenge on S. Korean Warmongers: People in DPRK
articles.content:
It Is Time to Take Revenge on S. Korean Warmongers: DPRK People
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are hardening their will to revenge upon south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime, which dared hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership in mourning period.
					 Upon hearing the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, Kim Chol Ung, a general officer of the Ministry of People's Security, told KCNA:
					
					 "The time has come when we should give vent to our pent-up grudge.
					
					 We will keep our full readiness and reliably safeguard the socialist system of the DPRK and safety of its people with our resolve to shower fire of revenge on Lee Myung Bak and the military warmongers of south Korea.
					
					 Retaliatory strikes without mercy will be dealt to the group of traitors which defamed our leader and social system."
					
					 Kim Myong Hwan, manager of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, said:
					
					 "The group of traitors will find no shelter in this land and sky, and there will be only deaths to such rabid dogs that committed an unprecedented high treason.
					
					 No one can break the strength of the single-minded unity of the Koreans standing on the same combat trench with the invincible army of Mt. Paektu."
					
					Rim Sang Ho, a member of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards of the Sunchon Thermal Power Plant, said:
					
					 "It is time to put an end to the existence of the Lee group of traitors.
					
					 Our people will clearly show this group of beasts what the strikes of our army are like. Our forces will wipe out the traitors from this land to the last man."

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Provocation Enrages People of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Provocation Enrages People of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The insult by south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has touched off surging indignation among its people.
					 A general officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), Kim Su Hak, told KCNA:
					
					 "The men and officers of KPA are ready to deal a crushing blow to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, including Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo, in revenge for their thrilling provocation."
					
					Minister of Metal Industry Jon Sung Hun said:
					
					 "We have an army, which has grown stronger under the Songun (military-first) politics. There will be no shelter in this planet for those war-thirsty fools running amuck like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger."
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, said:
					
					 "Traitor Lee Myung Bak should not make a conclusion that our resentment will calm down on its own accord."
					
					 General Director of the Associated Fruit Group Kim Chol Ho said:
					
					 "The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is a pack of mad dogs that can never live under this sky. Once an order for southward advance is given, our employees will turn out in a sacred war with arms in hands."

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Take Fascist Action against Pro-reunification Figures
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Take Fascist Action against Pro-reunification Figures
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of Unification took such fascist action as imposing fines on Ri Sung Hwan, chairman for Policy of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Jong Kyong Ran and Jang Tae Yon, its co-executive chairpersons, on charge of having contacted with members of the north side without permission.
					 The south side committee had submitted an application to the puppet Ministry of Unification for contact with the north side to discuss the issue of significantly marking the 5th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration this year.
					
					 The ministry, however, refused to permit it, saying that it would selectively allow only non-governmental exchange in non-political field and that the contact might assume political nature.
					
					 Infuriated by this, the organization held a working-level contact despite the authorities' suppression.
					
					 This won the praise of the fellow countrymen as it was a just deed done to realize the cherished desire of the nation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet regime inflicted penalty upon them on charges of violation of the "law on south-north exchange and cooperation."
					
					 The Lee regime's act of treachery will only add to its crimes and precipitate its doomsday.

articles.title: Servicepersons at Tabaksol Military Post on Alert
articles.content:
Servicepersons at Tabaksol Military Post on Alert
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons at the Tabaksol (young pine trees) military post, too, hardly repress their surging indignation at the hideous provocation committed by south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 An officer Kim Song Chol told KCNA:
					
					 "The insult of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to the peerlessly great men, whom the whole of world reveres, is a thrice-cursed crime. All our servicepersons are eagerly waiting for an order for southward advance. 
					
					 The traitors committed such high treasons, rather than expressing condolences over the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. They are, indeed, hooligans never to be found in the world.
					
					 Merciless punishment should be dealt upon traitor Lee, who stands against reunification and the DPRK."
					
					 An officer Kim Hyok said:
					
					 "We do not make empty words. The world will soon witness how the Korean People's Army (KPA) will destroy the provocateurs who dared slander the dignity of its Supreme Commander."
					
					 A soldier Sin Chung Hyok said:
					
					 "Once an order for southward advance is given, I will dismember Lee Myong Bak, Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo with my own hands."

articles.title: Ranks of Civilians Assisting Army Expand
articles.content:
Civilians Assisting Army Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of people turn out to assist the army, their hearts burning with the firm resolution to take merciless revenge upon the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, the sworn enemy.
					 The employees of Kaeson Entrails Soup Restaurant in Pyongyang City sent national flags of the Republic and a lot of aid materials prepared with sincerity to soldiers. They hoped the soldiers would fly those flags of victory over Chongwadae, the den of evils.
					
					 Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers and agricultural workers in Pyongyang and Nampho cities and in South Phyongan, Kangwon and North Hamgyong provinces also sent aid goods to service personnel to help them in military and political trainings and military service.
					
					 Members of the women's union across the country did the similar work after letting their husbands, sons and daughters to join or rejoin the KPA so that they might stand in the van of decisive battles.

articles.title: Patriotic Song Loved by Korean People
articles.content:
Patriotic Song Loved by Korean People 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- "I Know It Now", a theme song of feature film "Wolmi Island", is now popular among the Korean people.
					The song represents the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country displayed by the soldiers of the Korean People's Army. In the last Fatherland Liberation War, a company of the KPA defended Wolmi Island for three days with only four cannons from the attack by more than 50 000 enemy troops.
					
					 This song stresses that everything of the country liberated by President Kim Il Sung is more precious than one's life.
					
					 The Korean people came to know through experiences the truth that their motherland is just the care of the leader guaranteeing their worthwhile life and happiness of posterity. Stressing this idea, the song shows the unshakable faith and will of the Korean army and people to devote their all to defending their homeland, just their leader.
					
					 Singing this song all servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK are now waiting for the time to launch a sacred war against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.

articles.title: Secondary School Graduates March to Oun-dong
articles.content:
Secondary School Graduates March to Oun-dong 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Secondary school graduates in Pyongyang marched to Oun-dong Thursday. 
					 After arriving there, they learnt about General Secretary Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary exploits hearing stories that he during military camping conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities, demonstrating his unique commanding art.
					
					 Then they held a meeting at which they vowed to turn out in the sacred war of Korean style to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which committed high treason. 
					
					 The statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers vowed to join the Korean People's Army, firmly determined to unhesitatingly dedicate their youth and lives to the battles for making a clear sweep of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors with arms of Mt. Paektu as they hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and accomplishing the historic cause of national reunification. 
					
					 They underscored the need to devotedly safeguard the dear respected Kim Jong Un with arms as sons and daughters of Pyongyang and exalt the honor of being Songun youth vanguard in every work site for a great surge for building an economic power.
					
					 The meeting was followed by an art performance given by graduates from secondary schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The marchers looked round the barracks where Kim Jong Il spent his camping days, armory and other revolutionary historic sites.

articles.title: Updated Potato Processing Factory Goes Operational
articles.content:
Updated Potato Processing Factory Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The potato processing factory in Thongil Street, Pyongyang has been technologically updated.
					 All production processes of the factory having a total floor space of more than 8 000 square meters are equipped with state-of-the-art facilities. The factory has also a modern storehouse capable of storing a large amount of potatoes on a scientific basis.
					
					 Its updating made it possible to significantly boost its production capacity and help improve the diet of people.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the project was held on Thursday.

articles.title: Great Men's Feats for Korean Women's Movement in Japan
articles.content:
Great Men's Feats for Korean Women's Movement in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Today, International Women's Day, the Korean women recall the exploits President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great persons, performed for the women's movement, especially the movement of Korean women in Japan
					 After the liberation of Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung showed deep care for the Korean women's movement in Japan. 
					
					 He authored famous works, including "On Some Tasks Facing the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan", to show the road for the Korean women in Japan to follow, and frequently encouraged them in the patriotic drive, highly appreciating their achievements. 
					
					 In November Juche 66 (1977) the President met a home-visiting delegation of Japan-resident Korean women to encourage them to rally all other Korean women of different social strata. 
					
					 True to his lofty intention, leader Kim Jong Il paid deep concern to the work of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan. 
					
					 Even in the period of the arduous march, the forced march, the leader indicated ways for the Union to enhance its role in propelling the patriotic cause of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					
					 The wise leadership of the President and the leader brought about a remarkable progress in the movement of Japan-resident Korean women.
					
					 The Union's basic organizations, including chapters and branches, were strengthened to conduct diverse activities in various fields. 
					
					 Progress was also made in preserving the national character. 
					
					 The Korean women in Japan have maintained good traditional manners and customs in their daily life.
					
					 Their efforts to preserve the national identity are made in artistic field, too.
					
					 Typical of examples to show such efforts is a music and dance performance an art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave in Pyongyang in February last to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In this performance Kim Yu Ri, an actress of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of Chongryon, won acclamation with her dance "Traditional Korean Jacket and Skirt", which represents the Korean women in Japan defending their nationality from the Japanese reactionaries' suppression.

articles.title: International Women's Day Significantly Marked in Liberated Korea
articles.content:
Int'l Women's Day Significantly Marked in Liberated Korea
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean women are recollecting great feats of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, on the occasion of the International Women's Day.
					 One day in February Juche 35 (1946) President Kim Il Sung asked an official to prepare a report to be delivered at a meeting to commemorate the International Women's Day.
					
					 When the official was taking pains over drafting the report, Kim Jong Suk called on him to help drawing it up properly.
					
					 Repeatedly examining the draft, she told the official about the purport of the meeting, which was to further strengthen the Korean women's movement.
					
					 She added that the report should focus on the policy shaped by the President for the Korean women's movement, its validity and the tasks for implementing the policy.
					
					 Later, she personally revised some phrases in the report rewritten by the official.
					
					 The President expressed satisfaction over the report, saying that it properly reviewed the history of development of the Korean women's movement and analyzed its experiences correctly. It was admirable that the report stressed the feats and experience gained in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle would serve as a precious asset for the development of the women's movement and settlement of the women-related problems, he added.
					
					 Korean women significantly marked the International Women's Day in the presence of Kim Jong Suk for the first time in the country after its liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.

articles.title: Social Benefits for Women in DPRK
articles.content:
Social Benefits for Women in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Women in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are enjoying all kinds of social benefits given by the state.
					 The government and social cooperative organizations grant those women on a maternity leave wages, food and other shares, little different from what they receive on their jobs.
					
					 Maternity hospitals and other health care institutions take care of women's health before and after they give birth to babies, at public expense.
					
					 The state looks after babies and pre-school children at nurseries and kindergartens.
					
					 The DPRK Labor Law stipulates that woman employees are not allowed to work under vibrancy-riddled and cold-temperature conditions, carry heavy loads or work under water.
					
					 Women with three children under 13 ages do work less hours than others, while being paid as much as others.
					
					 There are woman counsel offices, nurseries, kindergartens and children's clinics at all factories and enterprises throughout the country.

articles.title: DPRK Women Call Kim Jong Il Father
articles.content:
DPRK Women Call Kim Jong Il Father
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- On the International Women's Day, women in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are sorely missing General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who showed deep loving care for them in his lifetime.
					 In the DPRK, women are regarded as a powerful force turning one of the two wheels of revolution.
					
					 They have played a big role in the production and construction. Wives of servicemen have devotedly worked to look after soldiers with maternal love.
					
					 It was leader Kim Jong Il who had acknowledged the women's devoted efforts for families and society and shown deep loving care for them.
					
					 He personally named newborn babies and posed for souvenir pictures with housewives. When calling at a house he praised the housewife for having prepared balls of soybean malt and made a promise with her to come again to taste soybean sauce later.
					
					 He also sent autographs to common women in reply to their letters and visited a newly built apartment building to congratulate women artistes on their moving into new houses.
					
					 There were also stories that helicopters were sent under his instructions to carry women pregnant with triplets to the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 Untold are such stories about the leader's deep loving care for women.
					
					 That is why the Korean women unreservedly call Kim Jong Il father.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Koreans' Pledge to Wage War of Retaliation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Koreans' Pledge to Wage War of Retaliation
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The world attention is focused on the Korean Peninsula at the moment.
					 The Koreans are vowing to turn out in a sacred war to settle accounts with the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The people who shed tears of grief are now pledging to take revenge on the enemies.
					
					 All the service members of the Korean People's Army including those of the 2nd and 4th corps and the civilian defence forces have taken up alert posture with their rifles fully charged. Lots of young Koreans are volunteering for military service.
					
					 Discharged soldiers petitioned to be allowed to rejoin the army, renewing their pledge to take part in wiping out the enemies.
					
					 The situation reminds one of the wartime.
					
					 The spirit of wiping out worst traitor Lee Myung Bak runs high across the country.
					
					 All of them are fully combat ready to blow up the stronghold of the enemies with powerful strikes once they show the sign of the slightest provocation.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are waiting for an order.
					
					 Korean-style sacred war will go on till the masterminds including Lee Myung Bak and other military warmongers are punished and they make apology for the high treason they committed before the nation.
					
					 The Koreans' wrath has never run high as now.
					
					 The provokers were not aware of the fact that the army and people of the DPRK regard the dignity of its supreme leadership more valuable than their own lives as it represents their today and future.
					
					 An ordinary Children's Union member rushed into a house that was ablaze to retrieve the portraits of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and young people protected barked trees bearing slogans from fire to preserve the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 Still hurting the Koreans are the pains they felt after losing the peerlessly great men who dedicated their all to the nation till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak rubbed salt into wounds of the Koreans.
					
					 If the world knows this, it will understand why the entire army of the DPRK has grown up to be the combat ranks as firm as an iron wall to devotedly defend its leader and why the big units ready to blow up themselves are on standby ready to go into action.
					
					 All the people in the DPRK turn out in a war of retaliation with towering grudge at their sworn enemy with whom they can not live under the same sky.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Desperate Efforts to Get Rid of Their Crisis Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Desperate Efforts to Get Rid of Their Crisis Ridiculed 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's such hideous provocations as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK only precipitate the collapse of the fascist dictatorial system and the end of pro-U.S. puppet regime and they will so strongly backfire that all the Koreans will be emboldened to bring earlier the country's reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					 Citing facts to prove that the south Korean conservative group has kicked up an extreme hysteria of confrontation with compatriots and war fever in south Korea, while talking about the "lost decade" since the outset of its office, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The group committed without hesitation such provocations as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK against the background of the large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills it kicked off  in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. They are premeditated political and military provocations to ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is in the grip of the most serious crisis.
					
					 The anachronistic policy of escalating the confrontation with compatriots pursued by the conservative group is on the verge of total failure and the anti-reunification forces find themselves in a bottomless predicament.
					
					  The inter-Korean relations have been driven to the brink of a war where there is no chance of dialogue and cooperation. This grim situation goes to clearly prove the dangerous and traitorous nature of the conservative group's "policy toward the north". 
					
					 Lurking behind the saber-rattling kicked off by the group of traitors in league with outside forces and the most hideous provocations committed by it is a sinister intention to realize its criminal ambition at any cost with the help of outside forces.
					
					 The fact clearly proves that the Lee group of traitors is hordes of confrontation maniacs who put the successive dictators into the shade, and fascist gangsters bereft of any elementary ethics and morality.
					
					 The above-said provocations are nothing but ridiculous actions of those who do not know what is source of the DPRK's vitality and invincible might.

articles.title: U.S. Should Make Right Choice as Regards Its Forces in S. Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Make Right Choice as Regards Its Forces in S. Korea: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The issue of the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from the Korean Peninsula has remained unsettled since their occupation of S. Korea. It is entirely due to the U.S. that the issue has not yet been settled.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a by-lined article.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the U.S. has invented various absurd pretexts for years to justify its military presence in S. Korea, the article goes on:
					
					 It is the judgment of the U.S. that without occupying the whole of Korea it is impossible for it to dominate the Asian continent nor is it possible for it to lay a military siege to Eurasia.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are playing the role as a shock force for carrying out the U.S. strategy for invading the DPRK and its Asian strategy.
					
					  Accordingly, all the military actions of the U.S. forces in south Korea and Japan are being staged to serve the purpose of the U.S. scenario for establishing a military domination over the whole of Korea and putting Asia under its control.
					
					 No matter what clumsy excuses the U.S. may invent, it cannot hide the injustice and criminal nature of the U.S. military presence in south Korea.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces is an obligation which the U.S. should fulfill under international law.
					
					 The detente and promotion of stability on the Korean Peninsula and the improvement of the DPRK-U.S. relations have become a realistic demand. A key to the solution of the issue is to put an end to the U.S. military presence in S. Korea.
					
					 Even political and social circles and military strategic think tanks of the U.S. are admitting the injustice of the U.S. military presence in south Korea and the validity of their withdrawal.
					
					 Preventing the outbreak of a war and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula is not an issue confined to this region but a matter directly related to ensuring peace and security in the world.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to make a right choice.

articles.title: Women Called upon to Dynamically Push One of Two Wheels of Chariot for Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Int'l Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Today marks March 8 International Women's Day.
					 Rodong Sinmun editorially observes this day. The editorial calls upon the women to demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women in the ongoing all-out offensive for opening the gate of a thriving nation, single-mindedly united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean women are dignified as they have followed the road of a worthwhile revolution, leading the worthiest life under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, it says, and goes on:
					
					 Their ideological and moral traits have reached a noble level as they have grown up under the great concern of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among the ranks of pace-setters in the ongoing general advance for opening the gate of a thriving nation are women soldiers standing firm guard over the defence line of the country, women officials doing praiseworthy work for the people, women working hard to occupy the eminence of ultra-modern science, labor innovators displaying patriotism in their devoted work at factories and farms and a lot of women performing exploits in work sites for a great surge in response to the call of the WPK.
					
					 Thanks to such large contingent of admirable women revolutionaries socialism of Korean style remains undeterred and rosy future comes earlier.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Hypocritical Talk about "Dialogue" Snubbed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Hypocritical Talk about "Dialogue" Snubbe
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, south Korean Minister of Unification Ryu U Ik urged the DPRK to respond to the north-south dialogue in the wake of the talks with the U.S., asserting that "to solve the pending issues with wisdom would help pave the way for the south-north relations of helping each other to survive and co-prosperity and unification."
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 His talking about "dialogue" is as impertinent as speaking of funerals when the talk is of marriage, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is a touch-and-go situation where a war may break out any moment due to the DPRK-targeted war exercises and the gravest provocation of the south Korean conservative forces. It is nonsensical to talk about any dialogue.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group committed unethical crimes by leveling guns at the fellow countrymen in the north who grieved over the great loss to the nation at the end of last year, thereby refusing to be a dialogue partner themselves. Not content with this, they launched large-scale war exercises against the DPRK which is still in the mourning period and even committed such most hideous provocation by hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 It is, therefore, illogical for the north and the south to negotiate as if nothing had happened between them despite the fact that the most hideous political and military provocations were perpetrated in south Korea against the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities' talk about "dialogue" is nothing but a cunning artifice to evade the responsibility for the catastrophic situation created due to the above-said provocations and calm down the strong domestic and foreign public denunciation.
					
					 With no rhetoric about "dialogue" can the south Korean authorities cover up their extreme hostility toward fellow countrymen and black hearted intention to escalate the confrontation and the thrice-cursed crimes against the nation.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Insult to "Comfort Women" Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Insult to "Comfort Women" Denounced 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution to the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps made public a statement on March 5 to denounce the Japanese authorities for insulting the victims of the sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army. 
					 The statement said the Japanese ambassador in Seoul met some victims of the sexual slavery, citing the work of "people's funds". 
					
					 The Japanese authorities established the "people's funds" to downgrade the level of the reparation from the government level to the non-governmental one as part of their moves to gloss over the responsibility for Japan's past crimes, it said.
					
					 It noted they could hardly repress the surging anger and resentment at the Japanese authorities who met the victims in camera under the guise of "people's funds" the true colors of which were already disclosed. 
					
					 This is an insult to and mockery of the victims. What they want is not a few pennies of money but Japan's admittance of the sexual slavery in the past and apology and reparation by the Japanese authorities, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese authorities claimed that they have taken the aid step through the "people's funds", touching off the public anger. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities should not wrap the issue of apology and reparation for the past crimes with the cloth of humanitarianism but make efforts to fulfill their legal responsibility.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group's Most Hideous Provocations
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocations
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Japan made public statements Monday denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. They included Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, Ku Tae Sok, chairman of the Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Educational Association in Japan, and Ri Chong Gyong, director-general of the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan.
					 The group of traitors kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises together with the U.S. imperialists, creating a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula, the statements said, adding that not content with this, the Lee group undisguisedly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Unpardonable is the Lee group, the corrupt and depraved villains, who again rubbed salt into the wounds of the fellow countrymen who are still mourning over the loss of the great father of the nation.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak, wicked sycophant and traitor, deserves stern hammer blow.
					
					 We will value as our own lives the absolute authority and dignity of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, benevolent father and great teacher, and resolutely protect them.
					
					 No matter what desperate efforts the group of traitors may make, we will make tangible contributions to the building of a thriving nation and the cause of the country's reunification with the belief that we are sure to triumph as long as we are under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Wiping out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Korean in China Calls for Wiping Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Jo Kuk Je, secretary-general of the General Association of Koreans in China, Monday made public a statement in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					 The Korean nation's grudge and desire to retaliate the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are sky-high, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The group of Lee Myung Bak recklessly slandered and insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, hysteria against the nation and hideous provocation of pushing the situation to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 The group is the sworn enemy with whom Koreans can not live under the same sky and herd of traitors to be swept away with arms.
					
					 We will mercilessly smash anyone who seeks to slander and insult the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit.
					
					 Now is the time for the members of the Korean nation who are concerned about the destiny of the country and nation to turn out in the nationwide sacred war irrespective of affiliation, religious belief and political view to eliminate the Lee group at an early date.

articles.title: Lee Group's Most Hideous Provocations under Fire by Koreans Organizations in China
articles.content:
Lee Group's Most Hideous Provocations under Fire by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Koreans organizations in China condemned south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for perpetrating the most hideous provocations, the thrice-cursed crimes against the nation and the moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The Liaoning regional association of the General Association of Koreans in China and its affiliated Shenyang City branch made public statements on Wednesday. The bellicose and vicious provocations perpetrated by traitor Lee Myung Bak and his military gangsters had been pushed forward systematically in a premeditated manner for a long period according to their scenario.
					
					 The evermore undisguised moves of the group to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen betray the true colors of the rabid dog which gets more ferocious with its doom drawing nearer, said the statements. 
					
					 The Hailin City branch of the general association in its statement on March 3 warned that the group of traitors will have to pay a dear price for the thrice-cursed crimes committed against the Korean nation. 
					
					 The Jiamusi City regional association of the general association in its statement on March 4 said that those who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit will find no breathing spell in this land and the sky. 
					
					 All Koreans will turn out in the sacred war to wipe out all of them who committed the most hideous provocations, declared the statement.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in U.S.
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The North American Group for Study of Juche Idea and Songun Idea posted a special write-up on an internet homepage on Feb. 15 to mark the birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 It posted articles under various titles illustrated with a photo of him and the dear respected Kim Jong Un standing together.
					
					 It carried an article titled "General Kim Jong Il is alive forever in the hearts of humankind."
					
					 The article said:
					
					 There are numerous titles for Kim Jong Il whom the progressive people praise as a great man born of Heaven.
					
					 Among them are dozens of titles lauding him as the sun. They include "the sun of humankind", "the sun of revolution", "the sun of life", "the sun of hope", "the sun of guidance", "the sun of Juche", "the sun of socialism" and "the sun of Songun."
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the eternal sun as he instilled life and courage into all people, shedding bright rays over them, his face beaming with a broad smile.
					
					 The homepage also posted articles under such titles as "As there is great Kim Jong Un, Kim Jong Il's idea and exploits will be immortal", "What are the feats of Kim Jong Il?" and "The grand picture of single-minded unity seen in the north. "

articles.title: Austrian Organization Slams Key Resolve and Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Slams Key Resolve and Foal Eagle
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna adopted a resolution on March 2 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, a test nuclear war for invading the DPRK.
					 The resolution said:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are a grave threat to the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The group is firmly convinced that the Korean People's Army under the Songun leadership of the respected General Kim Jong Un is the army which is not afraid of any formidable enemy and is fully ready to beat back aggression by the U.S. and the south Korean stooges and deal thousand-fold strikes at them.
					
					 We demand the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government" stop at once the moves for aggression against the peace-loving DPRK.

articles.title: Iranian President Calls for Country's Scientific and Technological Development
articles.content:
Iranian President Calls for Country's Scientific and Technological Development 
 Tehran, March 7 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said on Monday that Iran will turn into one of the world's major scientific hubs in ten years. 
					 Ahmadinejad made the remarks at the inauguration ceremony of 40 medical, industrial and scientific projects in the northern province of Gilan.
					
					 He further called on Iranians to join hands to build the country.
					
					 He said the enemies' anti-Iran words are aimed at preventing the country from becoming a model for other nations.

articles.title: Cuba Denounces Restrictions on Peaceful Use of Nuclear Energy
articles.content:
Cuba Denounces Restrictions on Peaceful Use of Nuclear Energy 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Cuba denounced before the Board of Governors of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) on March 5, the prohibitions that affect developing countries regarding the access to equipment and nuclear technology for peaceful purposes.
					 "We reiterate our concern about the persistence of undue restrictions on exports to developing countries of materials, equipment and nuclear technologies for peaceful purposes," said Rodolfo Benitez, Cuban diplomatic representative.
					
					 Our country has been and continues to be a victim of these restrictions and prohibitions as part of the cruel and illegal blockade applied for over 50 years by the U.S. against Cuba, he said in his speech.
					
					 The ambassador in his capacity as governor of Cuba to the Board urged the immediate removal of these obstacles.

articles.title: Cooperation among Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Different Countries
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- China and Cambodia on March 5 met to pledge enhanced bilateral communication.
					 On the same day Indonesia and Cambodia agreed to boost cooperation on trade and investment.
					
					 Cuba and Algeria on March 1 signed agreements on cooperating with each other in the fields of health, sports, education and agriculture.

articles.title: Anti-War Demonstration in U.S.
articles.content:
Anti-War Demonstration in U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- An anti-war demonstration took place in Washington on March 5.
					 As the U.S. chief executive met with the visiting Israeli prime minister in Washington Monday, over 100 protesters converged at a park in front of the White House, urging the United States not to support a potential Israeli military strike at Iran's nuclear facilities.
					
					 The protesters shouted slogans such as "U.S. out of the Middle East".
					
					 They carried giant letters spelt out as "NO WAR ON IRAN." They denounced the U.S. and Israeli attempt at reckless military attack on Iran.

articles.title: Australia's Current Account Deficit Steadily Widens
articles.content:
Australia's Current Account Deficit Steadily Widens
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Australia's current account deficit widened to 8.37 billion AU dollars (8.93 billion U.S. dollars) in the December quarter 2011, the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS) said on Tuesday.
					 The current account deficit rose by 44 percent in the three months to December 31, the ABS reported.

articles.title: Mexico's Economy to Grow
articles.content:
Mexico's Economy Expected to Grow
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Mexico's economy may grow at least 4.5 percent in 2012, said the government on March 5.

articles.title: Jordanian PM Calls for Diplomatic Settlement of Iranian Nuclear Issue
articles.content:
Jordanian PM Calls for Diplomatic Settlement of Iranian Nuclear Issue 
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Jordanian Prime Minister Awn Khasawneh called for seeking a diplomatic settlement over the Iranian nuclear issue on March 5.
					 Any military action against Iran will invite a disaster in the region, he warned.
					
					 He noted that it will make the development in the region retrogress for decades.

articles.title: Iranian Armed Forces Clarify Their Stance to React to U.S. and Israeli Moves for War
articles.content:
Iranian Forces Ready to Defend Country: Statement 
 Tehran, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Staff of the General Command of Armed Forces of Iran in a statement on March 4 made clear its stand to defend the country from the U.S. and Israeli moves for a war. 
					 The statement said that the Iranian armed forces are fully ready to defend the country at any sacrifice.
					
					 The armed forces will take all options to cope with every possible military attack on their country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto dedicado a dia internacional de mujer
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto dedicado a dia internacional de mujer
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, presencio el dia 8 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu "La mujer es la flor" dedicado al Dia Internacional de la Mujer.
					Kim Jong Un felicito a las participantes por esa efemeride y extendio un saludo cordial a todas las mujeres coreanas.
					
					En el concierto, iniciado con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional, se presentaron las piezas de diferentes generos, tales como el quinteto femenino y coro "Madre de Corea", el coro mixto y pangchang (coro del foso) "La mujer es la flor", el duo mixto "Regreso mi querido", el solo y pangchang femeninos "Mi nuera", la musica orquestal "Muchacha en el columpio", el solo masculino y pangchang "Campanazo del cascabel de oro en el islote Rungna" y el coro "Una sola voluntad".
					
					Cuando el concierto llego a su climax, fueron invitados a la escena los espectadores.
					
					Los interpretes del concierto elogiaron en tono patetico las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quienes construyeron en suelo patrio una potencia socialista del Juche, y la historia de lucha del pueblo coreano y reflejaron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de cumplir a toda costa la causa revolucionaria del Juche compartiendo siempre el destino con el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien abre la nueva era de prosperidad de la Nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il mediante su extraordinaria direccion del Songun.
					
					  Igualmente, representaron la determinacion de las mujeres y trabajadoras coreanas de fortalecer la solidaridad combativa con las mujeres progresistas de todo el mundo que rechazan el imperialismo y luchan por la paz, la democracia, la independencia nacional, la causa socialista, la igualdad y derechos de la mujer.
					
					  Kim Jong Un respondio a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores y les felicito por el exitoso concierto.
					
					  Disfrutaron el concierto junto con el los matrimonios de los cuadros de los organos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas como Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, de los entrevistados con el Presidente y el Dirigente, de las miembros del organo de direccion central del PTC en esta capital, de las diputadas a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, de las funcionarias del CC de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, de las cientificas de la Direccion de Maquinaria Ryonha y la Academia Estatal de Ciencias como la filial de biotecnologia, de las profesoras e investigadoras de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik, de las funcionarias de fabricas, empresas y red de servicios, las innovadoras de trabajo, escritoras, periodistas, locutoras, creadoras y artistas en Pyongyang.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes tambien el embajador chino Liu Hongcai, el embajador ruso Valery Sukhinin y otros diplomaticos oficiales de las embajadas china y rusa en Corea, y sus esposas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de Latif Gandilov
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de Latif Gandilov
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el dia 8 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales de Latif Gandilov, nuevo embajador de Azerbaiyan en Corea.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung, los funcionarios interesados y un miembro de la embajada de Azerbaiyan.
					
					  Acto seguido, Kim departio con el representante diplomatico.

articles.title: Acto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
articles.content:
cto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer 
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 102o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer (8 de marzo).
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Choe Ryong Hae, la vicepremiera Kim Rak Hui, los funcionarios responsables de las entidades de masas, las funcionarias e innovadoras laborales.
					
					  Tambien fueron invitados las compatriotas en ultramar que permanecen en la patria socialista, las mujeres de las embajadas de varios paises y las representaciones de las organizaciones internacionales en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Ro Song Sil, presidenta del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea pronuncio el informe conmemorativo.
					
					  Ella se refirio a que bajo la sabia direccion de los Grandes Hombres sin pares el movimiento de las mujeres coreanas del Juche vino por el camino de la victoria y gloria orgullosas.
					
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung dio origen temprano a este movimiento en el periodo de la lucha antijaponesa revolucionaria y preparo la brillante tradicion.
					
					  Bajo la direccion activa del Presidente, la Madre Kang Pan Sok, indoblegable combatiente revolucionaria constituyo la Asociacion de Mujeres Antijaponesas preparando asi la base historica de la construccion de la verdadera organizacion revolucionaria de las mujeres.
					
					  Despues de la liberacion, el Presidente organizo la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea que abarca a las amplias masas femeninas y promulgo por primera vez en la historia la ley de igualdad de derechos del hombre y la mujer preparando asi el motivo de cambio radical en la forja del destino de las mujeres.
					
					En acato a la autoctona idea y orientacion del Presidente, la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa  Kim Jong Suk logro los meritos singulares en el desarrollo del movimiento por la emancipacion de las mujeres de nuestro pais.
					
					En la historia del movimiento de mujeres coreanas estan impregnadas las imperecederas hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dirigio sabiamente dicho movimiento con la bandera del Songun.
					
					El publico la obra "Las mujeres son las poderosas fuerzas que impulsan la revolucion y la construccion" y otras preparando el gran programa a tomar para siempre por el movimiento de mujeres coreanas.
					
					La autoctona idea sobre el movimiento de mujeres, la hereda fidedignamente el Maximo Dirigente     Kim Jong Un.
					
					Por ultimo, destaco que todas las mujeres deben enaltecer de generacion en generacion al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y glorificar eternamente sus gloriosas vidas revolucionarias e imborrables hazanas.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines de militares y civiles en localidades de Corea
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines de militares y civiles en localidades de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este jueves los mitines de militares y civiles de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur, Hamgyong del Norte y la ciudad de Nampho para exterminar con la despiadada guerra sagrada a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que insulto la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En las ocasiones se dio lectura a la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Hicieron uso de la palabra los secretarios responsables de los comites del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en mencionadas provincias y ciudad, generales y oficiales del EPC, miembros de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que nuestra sagrada guerra de represalia se desplegara cada dia mas con mas intensidad hasta que venguen mil veces los crimenes cometidos por la banda del traidor y anadieron que dara el golpe mas despiadado para que se arrepientan siempre los belicistas internos y externos, que intentan ganar las ganancias incitando al tonto como Myung Bak. 
					
					En la sagrada guerra de venganza de todo el ejercito y el pueblo que lograron la unidad monolitica mas poderosa que las armas nucleares bajo la guia de los grandes hombres sin iguales, las escorias humanas no tendran refugio en este mundo, aseveraron.
					
					Puntualizaron que crearan sin parar los milagros asombrosos en la defensa de la patria y en los sectores mas dificiles de la construccion del Estado prospero con el sentimiento de castigar a la banda de Lee.
					
					Acto seguido se desarrollaron las manifestaciones de denuncia.

articles.title: El mundo debe conocer bien a la RPDC - comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
El mundo debe conocer bien a la RPDC - comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hoy dia, la atencion mundial se enfoca en la Peninsula Coreana donde se libra la sagrada guerra contra la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que insulto la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El mar de lagrimas de sangre derramadas por el gran duelo nacional se ha convertido en la furiosa ola de venganza. 
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, incluso los Cuerpos no. 2 y no. 4, y las fuerzas civiles entraron en la disposicion de combate mientras muchos jovenes solicitan que los alisten al ejercito o les permitan repetir el servicio militar.
					
					Todo el pais esta practicamente en el estado de guerra para liquidar al traidor de peor calana Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Nadie quiere ponerse a la zaga en la sagrada guerra de venganza y todo esta listo para destruir el bastion de los belicistas internos y externos si estos dan algun movimiento sospechoso. 
					
					La sagrada guerra al estilo coreano no parara hasta cuando el traidor Lee Myung Bak y los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana ejecuten a los autores principales del caso en nombre de la nacion y pidan disculpas. 
					
					Los provocadores no supieron que el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC aprecian mas que su vida la maxima dignidad del pais. 
					
					En la RPDC, se reportaron muchos casos en que los jovenes y hasta los ninos de la primaria se lanzaron al fuego para rescatar los retratos de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu y las consignas inscritas en arboles por los guerrilleros antijaponeses. 
					
					Crece cada dia mas el dolor que causa a decenas de millones de coreanos el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien se consagro para la nacion hasta el ultimo momento de su vida. 
					
					Sin embargo, el traidor salvaje Lee Myung Bak se atrevio a herir doblemente a la nacion coreana al ofender las lagrimas derramadas por ella y hasta su maxima dignidad. 
					
					Entonces, el mundo comprendera por que todo el ejercito coreano espera la orden de movilizacion cerrando sus filas para defender a costa de la vida a su lider. 
					
					Los coreanos, indignados al tope por el crimen de Lee, enemigo jurado, se levantaron unanimemente en la batalla de venganza de vida o muerte.
